title: How to Edit Polygon (bitmap) on top of a Google Map but still allow to move the map with swipe gestures?
body:
Hi,

I want to use this library in a Xamarin.Forms project.
I'm trying to put a bit map in a polygon shape (like your example: Show Non-Affine Matrix)
but this way I'm losing the swipe gestures on the map itself.
Is it possible to achieve both (maybe with absolut layout somehow)?
+ When a release the finger when finished to move one of the vertices, is there a way to convert the screen location to a longitude, latitude coordinate?
